text:
November 20, IS57
Mr. James W. Assad
525 Water Street
Brownsville,
Pa.
Dear Mr. Assad:
Thank you very much lor your letter of October S. Iam enclosing a television
{Pact Sheet index and believe you will find it helpful in obtaining material con¬
cerning the topic you mentioned in your letter •
Our Fact Sheets are available at ten cents per copy, or we can give you a com¬
plete set for $7.50 {§ $2.50 per year, the complete set covers 1355, 1556 and
1557). As of January, 1358, the NAEB Fact Sheets will be incorporated into
the NAEB Journal and will be availabe via subscription at $4.00 per year.
If you desire any Fact Sheets now, please let us know. Be sure to include
the Series number AND Item number.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.)Judith B. Cans
Secretary
Enclosures: Index
(5) Fact Sheet Samples
